divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 10 or 11 pm Friday evening, my 11 year old daughter and a friend werewalking up her driveway when they stated that an huge square object with lightsall around it and a square red colored screen on it, approached them over top ofthem and two lights beamed down on them. They heard no noises like a plain orhelicopter. It shined on them for a few seconds then it turned the lights offand then dissappeared. It came from the East then dissappeared towards thewest.
Summary: Object with lights and a red screen
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hillsboro
There was one other sighting in Hillsboro on or around September 22nd 2003
